txt.en: 'You shall not be allowed to venture further into this place. Your fleshy forms shall be useful to my master.'
'The voice... it called me here. I can feel it here. But that creature... when I arrived it punished me for being here. That creature says the voice is long past....'

'The master seeks to draw others to this place, for his uses. Our hope was that you would be of use as well, however you have proved to be troublesome. Instead your corpse will litter the cavern below.'
